content: --दामन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} one who gives liberally. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {1} a cloud. {2} a mountain. {3} the sea. {4} <ab>N.</ab> of Indra's elephant. {5} <ab>N.</ab> of a very poor Brāhmaṇa who came to Dvārakā with only a small quantity of parched rice as a present to his friend Kṛṣṇa, and was raised by him to wealth and glory.
